text.headline: Education: Bachelor of Technology in Biotechnology
text.text: Completed Bachelor of Technology in Biotechnology at University School of Biotechnology.

text.headline: Education: LL.B. in Intellectual Property Law
text.text: Earned LL.B. with Honors in Intellectual Property Law from Indian Institute of Technology â€“ Rajiv Gandhi School of Intellectual Property.

text.headline: Associate at KPMG
text.text: Managed intellectual property portfolio of over USD 1 billion, advised on patents and trademarks in USA, Europe, and India​

text.headline: Senior Associate at Gartner
text.text: Developed patent filing strategies, managed client relationships, and conducted technology contract analysis​

text.headline: Volunteer at New York Legal Assistance Group
text.text: Contributed to immigration case management, supported asylum seekers, and wrote blogs on gender and social issues​

text.headline: LLM in IP Law at Fordham Law School & Research Assistant
text.text: Pursued LLM in Intellectual Property & IT Law and worked as a Research Assistant at Fordham IP Institute​

text.headline: Legal Intern at Quest Software, NYC
text.text: Engaged in patentability analysis, infringement claim analysis, and patent prosecution strategy development​

text.headline: Cleared the New York Bar
text.text: Successfully cleared the New York Bar Examination.

text.headline: Litigation Associate at Lynn Gartner Dunne & Frigenti LLP, New York
text.text: Negotiated out-of-court settlements, drafted legal documents, and led IP due diligence for strategic acquisitions​

text.headline: IP and Trademark Associate at Adelmann Matz, New York
text.text: Negotiated out-of-court settlements, drafted legal documents, and led IP due diligence for strategic acquisitions​
